about_the_game:
Reach The Beat is an exhilarating VR experience that masterfully weaves action, melodies, and an abstract atmosphere into one dynamic game. Your responsiveness and sense of rhythm become the keys to success, challenging you to shoot targets in sync with incredible tunes. From brightly lit cityscapes to abstract neon scenes, every level in "Reach The Beat" unfolds a world of unforgettable visual and auditory sensations.

Key Features:

- Rhythmic Shooting: Sync your shots with the rhythm to score points and unlock new levels.
- Abstract World: Immerse yourself in a futuristic world where vivid colors and dynamic lighting create a unique atmosphere.
- Captivating Music: Enjoy a collection of electronic tracks from talented musicians that lift your spirits and motivate you to achieve more.
- Challenges and Achievements: Each new level introduces unique challenges that require speed, precision, and strategic thinking.
- Skill and Tactics: Develop your strategy for navigating levels to maximize your scores, using speed, accuracy, and rhythm.

Reach The Beat is not just a game, but an opportunity to become one with the music, feeling every beat in action. Are you ready to take on the challenge and prove yourself as a master of rhythmic battles? Join us and make your mark in the world of rhythms with "Reach The Beat"!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Dive into the stunning world of "Reach The Beat," where your shooting skills are tested to the electrifying rhythms of electronic music. In this game, every move and shot you make creates a musical harmony, illuminated by the neon lights of an abstract city. Ready to feel the rhythm?
